name: Wayne's World
description: Wayne's World is a movie starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, and Rob Lowe. Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.
keywords: public access,headbanging,breaking the fourth wall,based on sketch comedy,reference to blazing saddles

review.name: I laughed my head off!  Funniest film of the early 90's
review.reviewBody: Wayne's World is a silly yet utterly hilarious look at two dimwits (based on they're SNL skit Mike Myers and Dana Carvey) who have their own public access TV show called "Waynes World".  The story thickens to a nice touch with Rob Lowe as a big time hot-shot who wants to bring their show to big heights.  Tia Carrere has never been hotter as the woman who Wayne wants and "we'll be mine".  Many sight gags, many good lines, and probably all quotable, this movie (like Myers' Austin Powers) belongs in a place in comedy film history.  A++

Title: Wayne's World
